Isabella Rodriguez.description: having lunch with the other Love Ville program participants at Hobbs Cafe (conversing about two women, Isabella Rodriguez and Abigail Chen, meeting and spontaneously planning a thrilling adventure together, filled with excitement, trouble, and possibly romance, as they decide to ride off into the sunset and create unforgettable memories.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:refrigerator
